item.description:
Hi All - As many of you know, I recently moved the gallery/office to a new (old) building in Manchester. It's a gorgeous Victorian building that was formerly the headquarters for the Manchester division of the Red Cross.

There is an open house in the building this Thursday, June 18th from 5 to 8 pm and I will be there so if anyone wants to come by, see my new office and say hi......then come on down !

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Open House at Bijoux Office
